workData.title: Barbershop POS System
workData.description: Co-developed a Barbershop POS System in a 2-person team using Java, Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, Bootstrap and MySQL. Implemented Git workflow with separate branches for Frontend and Backend integration.
workData.longDescription: A comprehensive Point of Sale (POS) system designed specifically for barbershop businesses. This capstone project was developed in collaboration with a teammate, implementing a full-stack solution that handles customer management, service booking, transaction processing, and reporting. The system features a clean, intuitive interface that allows barbershop staff to efficiently manage daily operations.
features: Git workflow with separate Frontend/Backend branches

workData.title: Minibox Barbershop Management
workData.description: Developed a custom offline management system using Laravel & MySQL to digitize daily transactions. Designed responsive UI using Bootstrap and successfully deployed to replace manual recording.
workData.longDescription: A custom-built offline management system developed for a local barbershop to digitize their daily operations. This freelance project replaced their manual paper-based recording system with a digital solution that tracks transactions, manages inventory, and generates business reports. The system is designed to work offline, making it reliable even without internet connectivity.

workData.title: Core Initiative Frontend
workData.description: Built an e-commerce catalog using Vue.js that fetches product data from FakeStore API. Implemented category filtering (Men's, Women's, Unavailable) with a provided style guide and color palette.
workData.longDescription: A virtual internship project at Rakamin Academy where I developed an e-commerce product catalog using Vue.js. The application integrates with FakeStore API to fetch product data dynamically and categorizes products into three sections: Men's clothing, Women's clothing, and Unavailable products. Implemented the UI based on a provided style guide and color palette to ensure design consistency. This project enhanced my skills in API integration, state management, and responsive design.

workData.title: SchizoCheck - Expert System
workData.description: Building an expert system website for early detection of schizophrenia using Forward Chaining and Certainty Factor methods. Built with Laravel, Bootstrap, and MySQL.
workData.longDescription: SchizoCheck is a web-based expert system for early detection of schizophrenia symptoms, developed as a final exam project for the Expert System course. The system uses Forward Chaining method combined with Certainty Factor to analyze user responses and provide preliminary diagnosis. Features include symptom questionnaire, schizophrenia type classification (Paranoid, Hebephrenic, Residual), and educational content about mental health. The project has two main sections: public pages for users and admin dashboard for managing expert knowledge base.
features: Forward Chaining & Certainty Factor diagnosis method
Admin dashboard for knowledge base management
Educational content with mental health resources

workData.title: Dewa Motor - Inventory & Catalog
workData.description: Building an integrated inventory and catalog system for Dewa Motor dealership using Laravel, Bootstrap, and MySQL. Features public catalog and admin management pages.
workData.longDescription: Dewa Motor is a web-based integrated inventory and catalog management system developed as a final exam project for the CMS course. The system consists of two main sections: a public-facing motorcycle catalog where customers can browse available vehicles with filtering options (brand, category, price range, year), and an admin dashboard for managing the inventory. The catalog dynamically syncs with the admin database - any vehicle added, edited, or deleted in admin immediately reflects on the public catalog.
features: Public motorcycle catalog with search & filters
Real-time sync between admin and public catalog

workData.title: FTI UMBY Website Remake
workData.description: Rebuilt the Faculty of Information Technology UMBY website using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features an interactive chatbot with template-based Q&A using vanilla JS.
workData.longDescription: A website remake project for the Faculty of Information Technology at Universitas Mercu Buana Yogyakarta, developed as a final exam project for the Web Design Interface course in semester 2. Built entirely with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without any frameworks. The highlight feature is an interactive chatbot that answers frequently asked questions about FTI UMBY using predefined templates, implemented purely with vanilla JavaScript.
features: Contact form with Google Maps integration
